thread.section_title: Reservation Counter Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Reservation Counter | reservationcounter.com | 9 of 1159
thread.title: Charles Fehring
thread.title_full: Reservation Counter reviewed by Charles Fehring

author: Charles Fehring
title: Charles Fehring
text:
I was not offered the opportunity to look for any room rate discounts such as senior citizen, retired military, best available or any other category. That's never happened before. I was offered one room at one rate and that was it.
It never asked me if I was, nor recognized that I am, a Marriott Rewards member. This encounter was so disappointing, this could very well my last night staying in a Marriott property.
